item.title: Code Snippet for Dealing with Windows Forms ListView control in details mode
item.description: I needed a piece of code to manage list-view controllers. I needed to use ListView controls in the details mode, which automatically sort its contents when I click on the header, and also pastes the content in a tabular format when I press Ctrl+C or Ctrl+Insert on it. So I created the following classes. The code that carries out the sorting stuff when the header is clicked is taken from this following MSDN article.
